author: Buddha
message: Your body is precious. It is our vehicle for awakening. Treat it with care.
title: Thought of the day

author: Claire Charmont
message: The one who always loses, is the only person who gets the reward.
title: Thought of the day

author: Pema Chodron
message: The future is completely open, and we are writing it moment to moment.
title: Thought of the day

message: Each time we face a fear, we gain strength, courage, and confidence in the doing.
title: Thought of the day
